verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3748"\w* escaped, \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* Melita. \w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* barbarians shewed \w us|strong="G2564"\w* no small courtesy.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* kindling \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4443"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* refreshed \w us|strong="G3930"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* present \w rain|strong="G5205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w cold|strong="G5592"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w barbarians|strong="G0915"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w hanging|strong="G2910"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w Undoubtedly|strong="G3843"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w murderer|strong="G5406"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath escaped \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* vengeance doth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3708"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G4442"\w* \w he|strong="G3767"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* shaking \w off|strong="G0660"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w harm|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3739"\w* \w places|strong="G5117"\w* \w were|strong="G3739"\w* \w possessions|strong="G5225"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief \w man|strong="G4413"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Publius|strong="G4196"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* receiving \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w entertained|strong="G3579"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w courteously|strong="G5390"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w Publius|strong="G4196"\w* \w lay|strong="G2007"\w* \w sick|strong="G2621"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w fever|strong="G4446"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* bloody flux. \w To|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G5495"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* honoured us \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* honours, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w set|strong="G0321"\w* \w sail|strong="G0321"\w*, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* laded us \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w such|strong="G3739"\w* \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3739"\w* \w necessary|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w we|strong="G1161"\w* sailed \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G3326"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* Alexandria, \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w wintered|strong="G3914"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w*, whose sign \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Castors.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G2532"\w* come \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Syracusa, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* tarried there \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w From|strong="G2064"\w* thence, compassing \w by|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* shore, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rhegium|strong="G4484"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w south|strong="G3558"\w* \w wind|strong="G3558"\w* blowing, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w second|strong="G1206"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Puteoli|strong="G4223"\w*;

\w Where|strong="G3757"\w*, \w finding|strong="G2147"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* desired \w to|strong="G1519"\w* tarry \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* thence, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w*, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w meet|strong="G0529"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w far|strong="G0891"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* Appii Forum, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Three|strong="G5140"\w* \w Taverns|strong="G4999"\w*: \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G2168"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w courage|strong="G2294"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* third \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w together|strong="G4905"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w assembled|strong="G4905"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w having|strong="G4160"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w custom|strong="G1485"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w our|strong="G0080"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3971"\w*, \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w*, \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G3748"\w* \w had|strong="G3748"\w* \w examined|strong="G0350"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w would|strong="G1722"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w released|strong="G0630"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G3748"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w contradicting|strong="G0483"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* constrained \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w appeal|strong="G1941"\w* unto \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w my|strong="G2192"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* desired \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G4354"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w Because|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* bound \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w chain|strong="G0254"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w letters|strong="G1121"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* thee \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w did|strong="G3777"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* hither, relate \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w desire|strong="G0515"\w* \w to|strong="G0191"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* thee \w what|strong="G3739"\w* thou thinkest; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w sect|strong="G0139"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1110"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0191"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w every|strong="G0191"\w* \w where|strong="G3739"\w* contradicted.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w appointed|strong="G5021"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w very|strong="G0846"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w his|strong="G0846"\w* lodgings; \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* expounded, \w testifying|strong="G1263"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w persuading|strong="G3982"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w out|strong="G0575"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w morning|strong="G4404"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w evening|strong="G2073"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* believed \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* believed \w not|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3754"\w* agreed \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, \w they|strong="G3754"\w* departed, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w*: \w Well|strong="G2573"\w* \w did|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w our|strong="G1223"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* Isaias \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w*: \w With|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ear \w you|strong="G3708"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G3708"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w perceive|strong="G3708"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w of|strong="G0191"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* grown gross, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* heavily, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* shut; lest \w perhaps|strong="G3379"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* converted, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* \w heal|strong="G2390"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.
And when he had said these things, the Jews went out from him, having much reasoning among themselves.
